a.h1: Mascoutah School District 19 Engaging every student, every day, in quality learning opportunities

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: District 19 is located in southwestern Illinois, just a 30-minute drive down I-64 from St. Louis, MO. We encompass the city of Mascoutah, all of Scott Air Force Base, western sections of New Baden, MidAmerica Airport, and portions of rural St. Clair County. We are rural. We are suburban. We are military. It makes for a great mix and a terrific educational experience.

div.p: Now available in Skyward Family Access is the Federal Impact Aid 19-20 tile. Impact Aid is 20% of the District’s revenue. Please assist our community by completing this brief form. For more information visit the District’s Impact Aid page under Scott AFB & MSD19! #19EveryStudent
Stream the Mascoutah football game here. Directions are included for creating an account and logging in. Go, Indians!!! https://mhs.msd19.org/o/mascoutah-high-school/page/live-streamed-msd19-events

MSD19 is participating in American Education Week. We are celebrating and reflecting on Mascoutah’s public schools, our accomplishments, our ties to the community, and people who are making a difference: https://www.facebook.com/Mascoutah-School-District-19-1458300994305025/
